name: @wallcrawler/aws-cdk
description: AWS CDK infrastructure for Wallcrawler remote browser automation

scripts.deploy: npm run pre-deploy && npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:ci: npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run pre-deploy && npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never --context environment=dev
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run pre-deploy && npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never --context environment=staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run pre-deploy && npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never --context environment=prod
scripts.destroy:prod: echo 'WARNING: About to destroy PRODUCTION! Use: cdk destroy --all --context environment=prod'
